a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Levelized cost of energy by technology, World
The average cost per unit of energy generated across the lifetime of a new power plant. This data is expressed
in US dollars per kilowatt-hour. It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in the cost of

text.textPath: Fossil fuels – high end of the price range
Fossil fuels – high end of the price range
Fossil fuels – low end of the price range
Fossil fuels – low end of the price range

text.tspan: Note: Data is expressed in constant 2023 US$.
